album.name: Advance Janus 3.1
album.description: After our trip to Pembrey to learn how to parakart, we decided to buy a traction kite. And we decided to buy the kite we had the most success with on the day, an Advance Janus 3.1 metre kite. We bought it through Paraventure (who we did the course with). These photos were taken when we took the kite out into the garden so we could get the lines tied on.

image.caption: The new kite in it's bag
Laid out on the grass with it's bottom on show
Richard gives us something to show the size of the new kite against
image.description: Just for the pedants amongst you, Richard is 5ft 10, so our kite is quite a bit bigger than him. It's 3.1 metres squared. And should be able to generate a good bit of power in the right conditions.

image.caption: Rich, the kite, the laptop and our neighbour's car
image.description: Yeah, unfortunately, the MGF isn't ours. We have a nice kite though :-)
